channel.title: 🏢 Institute of Computer Science, University of Göttingen on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Institute of Computer Science, University of Göttingen on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Learning to Predict Structural Vibrations
item.description: Deep learning predicts structural vibrations faster than traditional methods, reducing noise in airplanes, cars, and buildings, as shown by a new benchmark and frequency-query operator network.
